trends: There have been 4 other sightings in McMinnville
There were no other sightings in McMinnville on or around October 24th 2011
Summary: as i drove to town i saw a unidentified object in the sky light to dark gray object
divs: Sighting Detailsthe disk like shape in the sky was at a bought 20 degrees in the sky facing west,towards the cascade range; the light grey appearance would change, to lighter to darker gray as the object moved and tilted in large circle track,, at times the object would partially appear solid and transparent as it turned in slow large sweeping turn and tilted.. tried to view with binoculars ,could not view ..went back and forth from field glass to naked eye..could only see the object with naked eye.. object left or was out of sight could not tell. this object was stunning, witch left an uncomfortable feeling of unknown..it seemed as if the object had an intentional holding or hovering pattern ...
